apps.name: lidar-nn
apps.description: Applies a nearest neighbor (nn) interpolation to a LiDAR pointcloud and returns a regularized grid.

apps.name: ufunc-correct
apps.description: Calculates terrain correction factors used in radiation modeling for each cell of an input DEM.

apps.name: when-rad
apps.description: Calculates if/when each point on a DEM is exposed to direct solar radiation. Example of Numba-accelerated functional Python.

apps.name: get-dem
apps.description: For any point selected on the US map, retrieves corresponding 1 arc-second DEMs from USGS via HTTP request.
